authorizing and directing the Department of General Services, with the approval of the Governor and the Pennsylvania Historical and Museum Commission, to convey a tract of land in Upper Augusta Township, Northumberland County, to the Northumberland County Historical Society; authorizing the Pennsylvania Historical and Museum Commission to accept a gift of certain real property situate in the Township of Solebury, Bucks County, Pennsylvania; authorizing the Department of General Services, with the approval of the Governor and the Secretary of Environmental Resources, to sell and convey real property in Union Township, Bedford County;
